choosingTechStack: Choosing a technology stack is a highly subjective decision. If you appreciate test-driven development, adhere to SOLID principles, and enjoy building single-page applications (SPAs) with React, then this approach might be a great fit for you.
folderStructureCode: <c> src <c/> <c> ├── app # app entry <c/> <c> ├── assets # assets for images <c/> <c> ├── components # reusable blocks <c/> <c> ├── hooks # reusable custom hooks <c/> <c> ├── modules # custom modules <c/> <c> ├── services # API handling <c/> <c> ├── shared # stuff shared across app <c/> <c> ├── types # typescript types <c/> <c> ├── views # presentation <c/> <c> └── index.tsx # entry point <c/>
